From: "Mark Hughes" <mark.hughes@hughesarrell.com> 
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Subject: Reported Abuse - Speedhostingz.com 
Date: Fri, 16 Mar 2007 12:52:55 -0500 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; 
        boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0052_01C767CA.04484B90" 
X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 
X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 
Thread-Index: Acdn8+y8I9eC3m/HTki8CXj6gmT2+A==

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 16 Mar 2007 17:52:57.0024 (UTC)
FILETIME=[EDF3CC00:01C767F3] 

 (multipart/alternative) 
Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sirs, 
  
In accordance with your abuse policies and on behalf of my client, 
Vericenter, Inc., I am delivering this email to inform you that we
believe 
that your customer, Speedhostingz.com, is misappropriating Vericenter's 
trademark and other intellectual property rights and otherwise engaging
in 
deceptive marketing practices.  We believe that this customer may also
be a 
reseller of your services. 
  
Our research indicates that Speedhostingz.com is utilizing deceptive 
marketing tactics through search engines and posting on weblogs.  The
links 
below illustrate how this person or entity is misappropriating
Vericenter's 
trademarks and other intellectual property.  When you access this link
and 
follow the progression to the press release purportedly from Vericenter,
you 
are directed to the Speedhostingz.com site.  We hereby request that you
take 
appropriate remedial action and inform you that we intend to take all 
necessary action against Speedhostingz.com in order to enforce
Vericenter's 
intellectual property rights. 
  
http://blog.toranktools.com/27274/managed-colocation-web-hosting-firm-ve
rice 
nter-gains-clear-thehostingnewscom-press-release-add-hosting-link-web/ 
<blocked::http://blog.toranktools.com/27274/managed-colocation-web-hosti
ng-f 
irm-vericenter-gains-clear-thehostingnewscom-press-release-add-hosting-l
ink- 
web/>  
  
  
  
Mark Hughes 
Hughes Arrell Kinchen LLP 
2211 Norfolk, Suite 405 
Houston, Texas 77098
